name: Arcade Land
description:
Arcade Land is a compilation of six classic arcade games, remastered with 3D graphics and elements and all seasoned with additional mechanics and features from the classic games.

Arcade Land is set into a fantastic island levitating over the sea, where you get to drive the main character of the game, Jake, through different challenges in order to explore the island in full.

The story mode is based on Jake, having to overcome the different challenges and defeat the enemies in order to continue exploring the island to its end.

There are 6 different scenarios, where the main character will have to play against different enemies.

1 player
DUALSHOCK®4
Motion Controller 1/Player Required
PS Camera Required

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).
